content: Then go back to the stairs and head for the balcony (facing opposite the altar in The Emerald Hall). Turn to the right, and go up the stairs to find the Meditation Spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Then go back to the stairs and head for the balcony (facing opposite the altar in The Emerald Hall). Turn to the right, and go up the stairs to find the Meditation Spot.
